title: Tuesday Post Show Pre Show (3-9-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show Pre Show (3-9-21)
description:
The Post Show Pre-Show is now its own segment! Bobby plays a clip where a priest actually plays rap music during mass. Raymundo is using his Employee of the Month status to land sponsors. Bobby shares the ‘Will It Pizza’ bit idea for Lunchbox. We also ask the questions: do you shower after taking a bath? Bobby on wedding bands are in and how it’s going to be weird to wear jewelry.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
